english: When the interval came , everyone made for the bar .
chinese: 幕间休息时，大家都涌向酒吧。

english: "i love music," he told bertha in the interval .
chinese: “我喜欢音乐。”幕间休息时他对伯莎说。

english: The violinist resumed playing after intermission
chinese: 幕间休息后,小提琴家继续演奏。

english: During the interval , we were taken to the coffee bar
chinese: 在幕间休息时，我们被领到咖啡厅。

english: " i love music , " he told bertha in the interval
chinese: “我喜欢音乐。 ”幕间休息时他对伯莎说。
幕间休息造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In between parts of a play , there is often an interval
chinese: 在一出剧的两部分中间,常有幕间休息

english: During the intermission , let ' s go out for some fresh air
chinese: 幕间休息时,我们出去呼吸呼吸新鲜空气吧。

english: During the intermission , let ' s go out for some fresh air
chinese: 幕间休息时，我们出去呼吸呼吸新鲜空气吧。

english: Would you check your shirt - tails in the intermission , please
chinese: 你能不能在幕间休息的时候检查一下衬摆

english: " madame bron , just listen . please listen , madame bron . i want you to send up six bottles of champagne between the acts .
chinese: “布太太，听我说听清楚啦，布太太幕间休息时，拿六瓶香槟酒来。 ”

english: Last night we went to a concert . do you know what time we got there ? just in time to go out for the intermission
chinese: 昨晚我们去听音乐会了。知道我们啥时候到的么？刚好赶上幕间休息大伙纷纷出来透口气的时候。

english: Six bottles of champagne in the greenroom between the acts . it s my patron saint s day , and i m standing the racket .
chinese: 说定了，六瓶香槟酒，幕间休息时拿来，送到演员休息室今天是我的圣名瞻礼日，由我付钱。 ”

english: During one of the intervals , we left our seats and , in the corridor , we saw a tall woman whom my friend greeted with a bow
chinese: 在一次幕间休息时，我们到走廊里休息，看见一个身材颀长的女人走过，我朋友向她打了个招呼。

english: A man took his wife to a broadway show . during the first intermission he had to take a leak in the worst way , so he hurried to find the bathrooms
chinese: 一个男人带妻子去百老汇看戏，第一场幕间休息时，他非常想小便，于是赶紧去找洗手间。

english: When the third interval began , she turned round and spoke briefly ; the count left the box , and marguerite signalled me to come and see her
chinese: 到了第三次幕间休息时，她转回身去，说了几句话，伯爵离开了包厢，于是玛格丽特做手势要我过去看她。
